description: Payment processing, subscription management, and financial transaction handling
author: Stripe
content: Integrate Stripe payment capabilities directly into Claude for payment processing and financial operations.
features: Manage customer subscriptions and billing cycles
View transaction history and payment analytics
Handle billing operations and invoice generation
Monitor payment metrics and revenue data

steps: Add the Stripe server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http stripe https://mcp.stripe.com

useCases: Handle failed payments and retry logic
security: OAuth ensures secure access to Stripe data
Test in Stripe test mode before production
Log all payment operations for audit trail

troubleshooting.issue: Check test vs live mode configuration
troubleshooting.solution: Check the documentation for detailed troubleshooting steps.

troubleshooting.issue: Ensure webhook endpoints are configured correctly
troubleshooting.solution: Check the documentation for detailed troubleshooting steps.

examples.title: Processing Refunds
examples.description: Process full or partial refunds for payments. Include reasons and metadata for tracking. Stripe automatically handles failed payment recovery.

examples.title: Subscription Management
examples.description: Manage customer subscriptions including upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations. Control billing cycles and proration settings.

examples.title: Revenue and Analytics
examples.description: Generate revenue reports, analyze payment trends, and identify failed transactions. Essential for financial reporting and business intelligence.

examples.title: Customer and Invoice Management
examples.description: Manage invoices, send payment reminders, and track customer payment history. Automate billing workflows for B2B customers.

examples.title: Payment Method Management
examples.description: Manage customer payment methods including cards, bank accounts, and wallets. Update default methods and clean up expired entries.

examples.title: Webhook and Event Handling
examples.description: Monitor webhook events, retry failed deliveries, and track integration health. Essential for maintaining reliable payment processing.
